Issues.Message: Update this implementation of 'ISerializable' to conform to the recommended serialization pattern. Add 'System.SerializableAttribute' attribute on 'LeaseException' because it implements 'ISerializable'.

Update this implementation of 'ISerializable' to conform to the recommended serialization pattern. Add 'System.SerializableAttribute' attribute on 'LeaseTimeoutException' because it implements 'ISerializable'. Make the serialization constructor 'private'.
